bpi.most.server.services

Class AuthenticationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • bpi.most.server.services.AuthenticationService

  • public class AuthenticationService
extends java.lang.Object
    Common Service interface. Handles permissions, etc. Everything here is serializable Different implementations (GWT-RPC, OPC UA, SOAP, etc.) should be based on this implementations
    Author:
    robert.zach@tuwien.ac.at
